thread.title: Hearts fan takes massive tumble during Scottish Premiership match… and becomes an instant hero
thread.title_full: Hearts fan takes massive tumble during Scottish Premiership match… and becomes an instant hero

author: Richard Innes
title: Hearts fan takes massive tumble during Scottish Premiership match… and becomes an instant hero
text:
Sport Hearts fan takes massive tumble during Scottish Premiership match… and becomes an instant hero Hearts supporter gives a lesson in how to react when you've just made a complete fool of yourself Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Hearts fan takes a tumble attempting to retrieve ball Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Being a football supporters is a dangerous business. There are pitfalls EVERYWHERE. 
Bets can go wrong. Twitter posts can come back to haunt you. And, as beautifully demonstrated in the clip above, cameras at football stadiums can catch you doing something VERY silly during a match. 
Watch the video and you will see one unfortunate supporter manage to embarrass himself at Tynecastle, during Hearts' 4-0 Scottish Premiership win against Hamilton. 
The gentleman in question, sat in the Gorgie Stand behind the goal initially tries to catch a stray ball - and ends up going right over the top of the hoardings: (Photo: Hearts TV) 
Our mystery star eventually ends up flat on his face (no thanks to his cackling pals, who give him a not-so-helping hand on the way). (Photo: Hearts TV) 
While video footage of this incident going viral might seem like bad news for this unfortunate Jambos fan, there is an upside. 
He takes it like a champ. He stands up, bows, laps up the 'adulation' and generally owns the moment. 
Well played, sir. Very, very well played. Like us on Facebook
